Package com.polarion.platform.repository.external

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExternalRepositoryProvider
    Provides support for linking of revisions from one type of external repositories (e.g.
    IExternalRepositoryProvider.IExternalRepository  
    IExternalRepositoryProvider.IExternalRepositoryCallback
    Used by external repositories to notify the system about new revisions, and to save their state.
    IExternalRepositoryProvider.IExternalRepositoryConfiguration
    Base interface for provider-specific configuration classes.
    IExternalRepositoryProviderRegistry
    Registry of external repository providers and access point for configured external repositories and external repository configurations.
    IExternalRepositoryProviderRegistry.IVisitor  
    IExternalRtRepository
    Repository suitable for Resource Traceability usage.
    IResourceTraceabilityRepositoryConfiguration
    RT repository configuration that is used to open connections to remote external repositories.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExternalRepositoryConfiguration
    Abstract implementation of IExternalRepositoryProvider.IExternalRepositoryConfiguration that should be used as base for configuration beans of particular IExternalRepositoryProviders.
    ExternalRepositoryUtils  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExternalRepositoryCredentials.FieldType  
    ExternalRepositoryUtils.Action  
    IExternalRepositoryProvider.IExternalRepository.PollMode  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ExternalRepositoryCredentials
    Annotation is used for determining usernames and passwords in External Repositories Configurations beans and grouping them into credential pairs (username and password).
